parameters.query:
-- Get current totals
SELECT 
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM High_Scores_Archive) as total_scores,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Players) as total_players,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Machines) as total_machines,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM High_Scores_Archive WHERE DATE(date_set) = CURRENT_DATE) as scores_added_today,
    (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT player_id) FROM High_Scores_Archive WHERE DATE(date_set) = CURRENT_DATE) as active_players_today,
    (SELECT event_name FROM Events WHERE is_active = true LIMIT 1) as current_event,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Leaderboard_Cache) as players_on_leaderboard,
    CURRENT_DATE as report_date;

-- Get top 5 players from current leaderboard
SELECT 
    p.display_name,
    l.combined_score,
    l.current_rank
FROM Leaderboard_Cache l
JOIN Players p ON l.player_id = p.player_id
ORDER BY l.current_rank ASC
LIMIT 5;

-- Record today's stats for future comparison
INSERT INTO Daily_Stats (
    snapshot_date,
    total_scores,
    total_players,
    total_machines,
    new_scores_today,
    updated_scores_today
) VALUES (
    CURRENT_DATE,
    $1,
    $2,
    $3,
    $4,
    0
)
ON CONFLICT (snapshot_date) 
DO UPDATE SET
    total_scores = EXCLUDED.total_scores,
    total_players = EXCLUDED.total_players,
    total_machines = EXCLUDED.total_machines,
    new_scores_today = EXCLUDED.new_scores_today;
